item.title: Vivo X200 series goes on its first sale today: Check India price, offers, specs and more - India Today
item.description:
Vivo X200 series goes on its first sale today: Check India price, offers, specs, and more

Published On: Dec 19, 2024 Source: India Today

Vivo's latest flagship series, the Vivo X200 and X200 Pro, are now available for purchase in India, featuring cutting-edge specifications and exciting offers.

Price, Offers and Availability

  • Vivo X200 starts at Rs 65,999 for 12GB + 256GB variant and Rs 71,999 for 16GB + 512GB variant.
  • Vivo X200 Pro priced at Rs 94,999 for 16GB + 512GB model.
  • Offers include easy EMI options, cashback with select banks, free 1-year extended warranty, and discounts on protection plans.

Specs and Features

The Vivo X200 features a 6.67-inch OLED LTPS quad-curved display, a 5,800mAh battery with 90W fast charging, and a triple rear camera setup with a 50MP main sensor. The Pro model has advanced imaging features with a 200MP sensor and supports 4K HDR video recording.

Published By: Unnati Gusain

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked On Jan. 22? Here’s What To Expect - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy Unpacked On Jan. 22? Here’s What To Expect

Date: 19 Dec 2024, Source: NDTV Profit Tech

Samsung is set to reveal the eagerly awaited Galaxy S25 series smartphones at its upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event in January 2025, likely on Jan. 22, as per leaks.

  • The Galaxy S25 series will feature Snapdragon 8 Elite chips and One UI 7 updates.
  • Expected models include Galaxy S25, S25 Plus, S25 Ultra, and a new Galaxy S25 Slim.
  • Galaxy S25 Ultra may have a new telephoto lens and enhanced camera features.
  • One UI 7 will introduce new AI features and design upgrades.
  • Preview of Samsung's mixed-reality headset, Project Moohan, anticipated at the event.
Samsung plans to showcase the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event, introducing advanced AI tools and camera upgrades.

The Galaxy Unpacked event is highly anticipated among tech enthusiasts as Samsung gears up to launch its latest flagship devices.

item.title: Nothing starts rolling out Nothing OS 3.0 update based on Android 15 in India - The Hindu
item.description:
Nothing OS 3.0 Update Based on Android 15 Begins Rolling Out in India

Publication Date: December 19, 2024
Source: The Hindu

On December 19, 2024, Nothing announced the rollout of Nothing OS 3.0 for its smartphones in India, based on Android 15. The rollout will occur in phases and will include several devices by early 2025.

  • The rollout targets Phone 2 and Phone 2a initially, with other devices to follow.
  • The update includes a new Photo Gallery app with advanced features.
  • Users can expect a fully customizable lock screen with shared widgets, a countdown widget, and an AI-powered smart drawer.
  • Improvements include enhanced pop-up views, quick settings, visual and performance upgrades, and updated typography.
“Nothing’s NOS 3.0 introduces new features and enhancements that elevate the user experience while paving the way for more customizable and shareable interactions.”

This update represents a significant enhancement for Nothing's device ecosystem, promising advanced features that focus on user customization and improved performance.

item.title: Apple hits out at Meta’s numerous interoperability requests - The Hindu
item.description:
Apple hits out at Meta’s numerous interoperability requests

Published on: December 19, 2024

Source: The Hindu

Apple has expressed strong concerns about Meta's numerous interoperability requests, citing potential risks to users' privacy and security. This critique emphasizes the ongoing rivalry between the two tech companies.

  • Apple claims that Meta's 15 interoperability requests could alter functionality affecting user privacy.
  • The European Union's Digital Markets Act mandates Apple to allow interoperability with rivals.
  • Meta aims to access Apple's technology to enhance its own devices like Meta Quest virtual reality headset.
  • Apple warns that granting access may allow Meta to track user activities extensively.
  • The European Commission is evaluating compliance with interoperability measures.
"If Apple were to have to grant all of these requests, Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp could enable Meta to read on a user's device all of their messages and emails," Apple stated.

As the EU prepares to enforce the interoperability provisions, this conflict highlights the ongoing competition and differing views on privacy between Apple and Meta.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra vs OnePlus 13: Price In India, Launch Date, Camera Upgrades, Specifications, Everythi - Times Now
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra vs OnePlus 13

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

Samsung and OnePlus are set to clash in 2025 with their flagship smartphones: the Galaxy S25 Ultra and the OnePlus 13. Here’s a detailed comparison of their features and launch dates.

  • Launch Dates: OnePlus 13 launches on January 7, 2025, while the Galaxy S25 Ultra is expected at a Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, 2025.
  • Specifications: Both will feature Snapdragon 8 Elite chipsets; Galaxy S25 Ultra has a 6.9-inch display (QHD+), while OnePlus 13 has a 6.82-inch AMOLED display (2K+).
  • Battery: Galaxy S25 Ultra may have a 5,000mAh battery, while OnePlus 13 boasts a 6,000mAh battery.
  • Camera Upgrades: Galaxy S25 Ultra keeps a 200MP main camera; OnePlus 13 features a triple camera setup with three 50MP sensors.
  • Price: Galaxy S25 Ultra is expected around Rs 1,29,999, OnePlus 13 expected above Rs 64,999.

item.title: Decoding Whisk gen AI tool from Google, Instagram DM scheduling and HDMI 2.2 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Decoding Whisk AI Tool, Instagram DM Scheduling, and HDMI 2.2

Date: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Google Labs has designed a new generative AI tool called Whisk, which creates images based on shared prompts without elaborate descriptive text. The tool is not yet available in India, but it is expected to launch soon. The rise of refurbished technology products coincides with rising prices for new gadgets, and an increasing interest includes segments like smartphones, laptops, and tablets.

  • Whisk AI tool creates images based on other images shared as prompts.
  • India’s refurbished electronics market is projected to reach $11 billion by 2026.
  • Meta is urging California authorities to block OpenAI's transition to a for-profit entity.
  • Instagram allows scheduling of direct messages but only for text messages.
  • HDMI 2.2 standard to be announced soon; requires new HDMI cables.
“OpenAI’s need to evolve from a non-profit to attract future investments” - Sam Altman

This article highlights the latest advancements in generative AI, the burgeoning market for refurbished electronics, and updates regarding major tech platforms like Instagram and OpenAI, reflecting the ongoing shifts in technology and consumer behavior.

item.title: NYT Strands Today: Hints and Answers for December 19, 2024 - Beebom
item.description:
NYT Strands Today: Hints and Answers for December 19, 2024

Publication Date: December 19, 2024 | Source: Beebom

Today's Strands puzzle theme is Roll with it, with hints provided for solving Strands #291. The Spangram for the day is related to the gentle movement of a boat.

  • Hint #1: starts with 'P' and ends with 'E'; refers to development or social reform.
  • Hint #2: starts with 'G' and ends with 'E'; a genre of music.

The Spangram answer is Rocking and the words for the puzzle include GLAM, PUNK, GRUNGE, METAL, PROGRESSIVE, and ALTERNATIVE.

item.title: Apple hits out at Meta’s numerous interoperability requests - The Indian Express
item.description:
Apple Criticizes Meta's Interoperability Requests Amid Privacy Concerns

Publication Date: October 31, 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Apple has expressed concerns over Meta Platforms' multiple requests for access to its software tools, claiming potential impacts on user privacy and security.

  • Meta has submitted 15 interoperability requests for access to Apple’s technology.
  • Apple warns that Meta's requests could allow it to track users' messages, calls, and personal data.
  • The EU's Digital Markets Act requires Apple to allow interoperability with rival developers, risking fines for non-compliance.
  • A decision on Apple's compliance with the Act is expected by March next year.
“In many cases, Meta is seeking to alter functionality in a way that raises concerns about the privacy and security of users...” - Apple

The tensions between Apple and Meta highlight ongoing privacy concerns and regulatory pressures facing major tech companies.

item.title: NYT ‘Strands’ Hints, Spangram And Answers For Thursday, December 19 - Forbes
item.description:
NYT Strands Hints and Answers for December 19

Date: December 19, 2024
Source: Forbes

Looking for Thursday’s Strands hints, spangram, and answers? You can find them here:

How To Play Strands

The New York Times’ Strands puzzle is a play on the classic word search, presented in a 6x8 grid of letters with a themed clue that you must uncover.

What Is Today’s Strands Hint?

Roll with It
My hint is: Playing the classics

What Are Today’s Strands Answers?

Today's spangram is:

ROCKING

And the answer list is:

  • METAL
  • PROGRESSIVE
  • GLAM
  • ALTERNATIVE
  • GRUNGE
  • PUNK

Conclusion: The NYT Strands puzzle continues to engage players with its thematic word search, testing their knowledge of music genres.

item.title: WhatsApp users can now interact with ChatGPT AI chatbot. Here's how - Hindustan Times
item.description:
WhatsApp Now Allows User Interaction with ChatGPT AI Chatbot

Date: Dec 19, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

WhatsApp users can now directly message ChatGPT for answers or creative help with projects, following an update that gives the chatbot its own contact number on the platform.

  • OpenAI announced that anyone globally can message ChatGPT using the new phone number, 1-800-242-8478.
  • Meta recently introduced several new features for WhatsApp, including a new Typing Indicator for enhanced messaging experience.
  • WhatsApp will discontinue support for iOS versions earlier than 15.1 after May 2025.
  • Users can ask ChatGPT questions and receive assistance in creative writing, project planning, recommendations, and general conversations.
  • This feature aims to expand ChatGPT's user base as OpenAI addresses growing operational costs.
OpenAI stated that while the WhatsApp version of ChatGPT can be helpful, it is still an experimental feature.

This new integration offers a familiar platform for users to interact with AI, enhancing accessibility and engagement.

item.title: LG’s transparent OLED TV will put a very visible $60,000 hole in your wallet - The Verge
item.description:
LG’s Transparent OLED TV Launches at $60,000

Publication Date: January 8, 2024 Source: The Verge

LG introduces its Signature OLED T, a transparent TV priced at $59,999, available at select retailers and LG’s official website.

This innovative 77-inch television features both transparent and opaque modes, offering unique software features such as T-Objet, T-Bar, and T-Home for an enhanced user experience.

  • Price: $59,999.
  • Available at select LG-authorized retailers.
  • Features transparent mode for visibility of items behind the screen.
  • Includes unique software features not found in other LG models.
“The OLED T is forever out of reach for mere peasants like myself.” - Author

While the OLED T is a showcase of luxury and technology, its steep price may deter many potential buyers.

item.title: OpenAI makes ChatGPT available for phone calls and texts - CNBC
item.description:
OpenAI makes ChatGPT available for phone calls and texts

Date: December 04, 2024

Source: CNBC

OpenAI has launched a new service that allows users to communicate with its ChatGPT chatbot via phone calls and WhatsApp.

  • Users can call 1-800-CHATGPT (1-800-242-8478) or message via WhatsApp.
  • Initially, users will receive 15 minutes of free use each month.
  • This release comes as part of a series of updates from OpenAI.
  • The company aims to grow its user base by hiring a chief marketing officer.
  • The generative AI market is projected to exceed $1 trillion in revenue by 2032.
  • OpenAI's latest funding round valued the company at $157 billion.
“We’re working on ways to integrate WhatsApp messages with ChatGPT credentials.” - OpenAI Team

This phone and messaging service marks another step in OpenAI's aggressive growth strategy as they compete within the expanding AI landscape.

item.title: GitHub launches a free version of its Copilot - TechCrunch
item.description:
GitHub launches a free version of its Copilot

Date: Wednesday, October 25, 2023

Source: TechCrunch

GitHub has unveiled a free version of its AI-powered Copilot tool, previously requiring a subscription, with hopes to make coding accessible to a broader audience. GitHub also noted a rise in its developer user base to 150 million.

  • The free version offers 2,000 code completions per month, targeting occasional users.
  • Currently, users on the free plan can access limited code suggestion models.
  • GitHub's CEO emphasized the intent to remove barriers for aspiring developers globally.
“Now six years after being acquired by Microsoft, it indeed appears GitHub is still GitHub — and we are doing our thing.” - Thomas Dohmke

This initiative marks a significant step towards democratizing coding tools, potentially increasing inclusivity in the developer community.
